MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory<TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed

remarks.para: This method can be used to get a channel factory for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.

summary.para: Creates a channel factory that can be used to create a channel for sending messages.

returns.para: that contains the new channel factory of the specified type.

Docs.param: that specifies the binding context for the channel factory.
Docs.typeparam: The type of channel to produce.

remarks.para: This method can be used to get a channel listener for receiving messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.

summary.para: Creates a channel listener of the specified type for receiving messages.

returns.para: that contains the new channel listener of the specified type.

Docs.param: that specifies the binding context for the channel listener.
Docs.typeparam: that specifies the type of the channels to produce.

summary.para: Determines whether a channel factory of the specified type can be built.
